snippet.title: War Thunder - 'The Battle is on!' Trailer
snippet.description:
We devote this CGI trailer to our players, who always fight and never surrender. The battle is on!
Register now and play for free: http://warthunder.com/play4free?r=YouTube_pzgPXOw2plI

Gaijin Entertainment is proud to present the new CGI-trailer for the cross-platform MMO combat game War Thunder, called 'The Battle is On!'. It encompasses our vision of the game, where aircraft, ground vehicles and naval forces are locked in full-scale global combat over  theaters of war ranging from the Spanish Civil war, through to WW2 and the Korean War.

Site: http://warthunder.com/ 
Twitter: http://twitter.com/WarThunderEN
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/WarThunder
Forum: http://forum.warthunder.com/
G+: https://plus.google.com/+Warthunder/posts
